A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I think "The last Jedi" has butchered it's source material. 
It's stunning visuals and great cast (inherited from force awakens) can not make up for its missed opportunities. 
It was the last chance to show the original cast together on screen. 
Laila has been turned into Marry Poppins\, BB8 is now a terminator and Luke the strange drunk uncle. 
However I agree that the world isn't black or white\, nether good or evil. But you can't apply it to a franchise that's core is based around redemption. We need black vs. white and bad guys turning good!
